title: Who is a Good Top Laner?

replies.body:
If you're into that sort of top laner, I would recommend picking up Lulu. She has utility, and still has that 'sit back and set up a tent in my lane' feel that Heimerdinger has. If your team is a poke comp, then Lulu is good. However, if you want to shut down your lane opponent, try picking up champs like Renekton and Xin Zhao.

Just a 3 year top lane main trying to help someone out.
Thanks! Lulu looks fun, so does Renekton and Xin Zhao, I'll give them a try :3
I demand you add Galio to this list
